bug.author: ManishAradwad
bug.summary: Correction in calculation of error while Naive Forecasting
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/examples/blob/master/courses/udacity_intro_to_tensorflow_for_deep_learning/l08c03_moving_average.ipynb>https://github.com/tensorflow/examples/blob/master/courses/udacity_intro_to_tensorflow_for_deep_learning/l08c03_moving_average.ipynb</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
It should be 'mean absolute error' instead of squared error while Naive Forecasting <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29497701/72044240-4bd89a80-32d9-11ea-937f-a189784b83b0.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Yes, I'll be submitting one shortly
